comments.author: SybeHier

comments.text:
+Festim Zeqiri Shaq was pushing for Transfer in January Window,he was 
saying it in the media quite outright that hes been getting offers but 
Bayern Munich arent letting him go clearly suggesting that he wants to go 
but hes being bounded,so now as per Shaqs wish he will be getting 
Transferred,first there were talks that Shaq wanted to go to Liverpool but 
now the news making the rounds is he has agreed to go to Wolfsburg.

I suppose the Transfer is accepted which would explain why Shaq wasnt in 
that bunch,Shaq just never fit into this team,even in the last game when he 
was subbed in he just looked all lost on the field,Bayern Munichs game 
involves very sharp thinking,accurate and smart passing,not giving the ball 
away,winning ball back,running with it past opposition defenders,positional 
intelligence and awareness of other team mates on the field,good first 
touch,Shaq just lacked lots of the vital qualities needed to play in Bayern 
Munich.I suppose Good Luck to him.
